short_summary: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION (RFI) FOR THE PROVISION OF MERGE FUNCTIONALITY IN DYNAMICS 365 for CRM
description: The purpose of this RFI is to seek information from Industry on its ability to provide to CMHC a comprehensive out-of-the box duplicate detection, merge, batch merges, reporting and business rule settings software for Dynamics 365 customer engagement platform.
full_summary:
* **Title (English/French)**: Request for Information (RFI) for the Provision of Merge Functionality in Dynamics 365
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01007395
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Tender Date**: September 16, 2022 (Publish) / October 7, 2022 (Close)
* **Trade Agreements**: None Applicable
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Status**: Expired

## *Details of the Contract*
The Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites bidders to provide information on their ability to deliver a comprehensive out-of-the-box duplicate detection, merge, batch merges, reporting, and business rules settings software for Dynamics 365 customer engagement platform.

## *Scope of Services*
Bidders are expected to provide a solution that meets the requirements and technical evaluation criteria as listed in Table A: Solution Requirements and Table B: Additional Solution Requirements Information.

## *Tender Notice Details*
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information (RFI)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Ryan Lemay
	+ Email: rlemay@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
	+ Phone: Not Provided
	+ Fax: Not Provided

## *Accessing the Solicitation Documents*
The solicitation documents and attachments can be accessed at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/ using the reference number PW-22-01007395. Bidders are required to download the solicitation documents and attachments directly from this page.
